price: 35.Tohuk lakal qaziiz kee kay kataysis Nabii Yuusuf kaal heenimik barih yaniimih astooti keenih qaddowteek lakal, diggah casbit kaa haanam keenih tumbullee amixxige waa waktï fanah fadaacat meesih.
arabic: ثُمَّ بَدَا لَهُم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا رَأَوُاْ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ لَيَسۡجُنُنَّهُۥ حَتَّىٰ حِينٖ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: thumma badā lahum min baʿdi mā ra-awū al-āyāti layasjununnahu ḥattā ḥīnin
